name: Songs On My Ipod Quiz | Music Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: The first song on my Ipod is called "S.O.S. (Rescue Me)".  Who sings it?
questions.explanation:
Rihanna.

	Rhianna also sings "Pon De Replay".

questions.text: The next song on my Ipod is called "I'm Gonna Be (500 Miles)".  Who sings it?
questions.explanation:
The Proclaimers.

	"500 Miles" is on the "Benny & Joon" soundtrack.

questions.text: The next song on my Ipod is called "Whenever, Wherever".  Who sings it?
The next song on my Ipod is called "Uptown Girl".  Who sings the version I've got?
questions.explanation:
Alvin & the Chipmunks.

	The chipmunks are Alvin, Simon, & Theodore.

No Doubt.

	No Doubt also sings the song "It's My Life".

Bloc Party.

	Bloc Party also sings the song "Helicopter".

questions.text: Who sings "Who Says You Can't go Home"?
questions.explanation:
Bon Jovi.

	Bon Jovi also sings "Livin' On a Prayer".

questions.text: What show is the song "But, I Like You" from?
questions.explanation:
Sesame Street.

	Bert & Ernie sing that song.

questions.text: Which movie is the song "You Got a Friend In Me" from?
questions.explanation:
Toy Story.

	Buzz & Woody sing that song.

questions.text: Who (of these choices) sings the song "Year 3000"?
questions.explanation:
Jonas Brothers.

	The Jonas Brothers also sings the song "Mandy."
